title: What is the major difference between Alchemy and Alkahestry? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here's my crash course :) Alchemy is based on the concept of deconstruction and reconstruction. Meaning it can break stuff and rebuild it. In amestris alchemy is mainly used for combats needs and repairs and stuff ( But mainly combat) for example the main military force is made up of alchemists indicating the nations militaristic uses with alchemy. However In Xing alkahestry is built in the foundations of medicine. Alkahestry is also unique to Xing. The end.

Points for Alchemy: Uses equivalent exchangeIs used mainly for deconstructing and reconstructingPoints for Alkahestry: Uses the world’s energyUses equivalent exchange (I believe- I need to brush up on my FMA)Is used for medical purposesSo I would say the major difference is that Alchemy isn’t used for healing, while Alkahestry is.

Alchemy deals with the breakdown of an element to its material base elements,deconstruction and reconstruction in a different form . In other words,alchemy can create,destroy and then recreate matter in a new form.Alchemy is an international science recognized by the State of Amestris. Alkahestry by contrast is a purely medical process indigenous to Xing.
